WorkItem.Description:
I'd like to see how to write a code editor keyboard macro as a VS2012 plug-in. It should work as follows:

Press an arbitrary key combination to begin recording keystrokes.
Press a different arbitrary key combination to stop recording keystrokes.
Press yet another different key combination to play back the recorded keystrokes.
WorkItem.Summary: Write a keyboard macro plug-in for VS2012

Comments.Message: If it's just a keyboard-recorder, it has nothing to do with VS2012. Existing tools abound.
